text: Beck, Bogert & Appice is the first album by the '70s band Beck, Bogert & Appice. ==Songs in the album== == Personnel == * Jeff Beck: guitar and vocals * Tim Bogert: bass and vocals * Carmine Appice: drums and vocals Category:1973 albums Category:Blues rock albums Category:Hard rock albums
title: Beck, Bogert & Appice (album)
